functions.tag: {display:{Lore:['{"text":"§4謳い謳え"}','{"text":"§4我らが§e§l主君§4の御帰りだ"}','{"text":"§4唱え踊れ騒げ敬え"}','{"text":"§4今宵持って我らは終焉の神を出迎える"}'],Name:'{"text":"§4§k|||§r§4§l-封印されし§e§l災歌§4-§4§k|||§r"}'},AttributeModifiers:[{UUID:[I;0,2,0,1],Amount:30,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Operation:0,Name:"generic.max_health"},{UUID:[I;0,3,0,1],Amount:-999,Slot:"head",AttributeName:"generic.follow_range",Operation:0,Name:"generic.follow_range"},{UUID:[I;0,2,0,3],Amount:0.1d,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Operation:0,Name:"generic.movement_dpeed"},{UUID:[I;0,2,0,4],Amount:20,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Operation:0,Name:"generic.attack_damage"},{UUID:[I;0,2,0,5],Amount:20,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.armor",Operation:0,Name:"generic.armor"},{UUID:[I;0,3,0,2],Amount:-999,Slot:"head",AttributeName:"generic.luck",Operation:0,Name:"generic.luck"},{UUID:[I;0,2,0,7],Amount:15,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Operation:0,Name:"generic.armor_toughness"},{UUID:[I;0,2,0,8],Amount:0.25d,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:1,Name:"generic.attack_speed"},{UUID:[I;0,2,0,9],Amount:0.5d,Slot:"offhand",AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Operation:0,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance"}],HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:1s}]}
